title: Alex Choi
text:
Hi, I’m a PhD student at the University of Washington studying robotics and control. Previously I worked at Amazon as an Applied Scientist, and before that as a Mechanical Engineer.
In my free time I do recreational math, code, play chess, reschedule D&D sessions, and walk my dog (you can see Isaac’s ears in the pic).
